title: A small request
content: I feel dumb posting a thread for this question, but I've searched the entire forum with several different combinations of words, plus YouTube, plus Google, and I cannot find what I am looking for. I remember seeing on this forum a while back a video of a father and a son making brush alphabets side-by-side. It's a wonderful video, and I want to show it to someone, but I really can't find it. Does anyone happen to have it bookmarked?
author: DrDoc

comments.content: I know the video you mean, I think it was handpicked sometime ago!

Hi Eric,

that’s [abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317175530/http:/www.xelor.nl/xelor/pile.php?item=abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz), a film by Roel & Job Wouters.  
F
Thanks! I showed it to my girlfriend who's a psych major and specifically interested in developmental psych; she loved it! It's great when our interests overlap like that.

_when our interests overlap like that_

Oh, happy days ... ;-)
